original_title: จอมโหดมนุษย์ซีอิ๊ว
overview: A story of Wut young owner of soy sauce factory who went into the midst of a conflict between Brother Yai and his siblings. And in a one strange night with Mui, his close young woman. This is a mysterious film that we dare to say that you never watched it before.
title: The Cruelty of the Soy Sauce Man
